fn.p: Abbreviations: lncRNA, long non-coding RNA; NC, normal group; OA, knee osteoarthritis group; RT-qPCR, reverse transcription-quantitative PCR; GO, Gene Ontology; KEGG, Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes; ITGA5, integrin-Î±5; H MGB1, high mobility group protein B1; IFITM3; interferon induced transmembrane protein 3
